post.summary: Activate a user account in order to be able to give praise and receive rewards. Activation a user account creates a new User object or adds user account to User if it already exists.

post.summary: Generates a nonce for the user and returns it

requestBody.description: A request containing the user identityEthAddress

post.summary: Verifies a user's signature and returns a JWT token

requestBody.description:
A request containing the user identityEthAddress and signedlogin message. The signed message should be structured as follows: 

```SIGN THIS MESSAGE TO LOGIN TO PRAISE.

ADDRESS:
[identityEthAddress]

NONCE:
[nonce]```
